snippet.title: Forgotton Anne Accolade trailer
snippet.description:
Forgotton Anne is a critically acclaimed cinematic adventure available on PS4, Xbox One, Steam (and now also on Mac!)

Additional languages support expected late summer 2018.

Get it now!

Playstation Store:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP0082-CUSA08170_00-FORGOTTONANNE001

Xbox One store:
https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/store/p/Forgotton-Anne/C1XJKZ9JSPHN

Steam Store:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/542050/Forgotton_Anne/

For info, dev blog and more visit :
http://www.forgottonanne.com

Developed by ThroughLine Games:
http://www.throughlinegames.com
